select (select `name` from sys_user where user_id = aa.agent_user_id) AS agentUserName,
from ag_agent_app aa left join ag_agent_power ap on ap.agent_app_id = aa.agent_app_id left join ag_app_info ai on ai.app_id = aa.app_id where aa.agent_app_id = #{agentAppId}
select count(agent_app_id) from ag_agent_app where developer_user_id = #{userId} and agent_app_id_pid = 0
